specifications.Characteristics: Yarn Effect > Boucle BouclÃ© is a fabric characterized by its looped, knotted, or curled texture on the surface. It can be made from various materials, not just wool, and these unique loops give the fabric a warm feel and a rich, dimensional appearance.
specifications.Care Advice: Yarn Effect > Boucle Please be careful not to pull threads when using this fabric, due to its nature of this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Flat dry Do not iron
